name: Hatch (Gummy)
description:
Hatch

Hatch is a first-person 3D platformer where you gather coins and progress to next level by traversing across floating cones.

Release date: Summer 2022 Development:

Right now the game is in alpha, and I plan on polishing it up a LOT more very soon. But, I will be providing playable demos for the sole purpose of bug-testing.

This game is, believe it or not, my first ever game I've ever worked on. So, feel free to leave any comments or criticism down below!

Bug reporting:

Any bugs found in the game should be reported to npowellwork@gmail.com.
